All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DefaultErrorItem
 
DefaultErrors
 
DefaultHstPageFlowControl
Default generic PageFlowControl implementation for an HST-based site web application to integrate with Page Flow module.
DefaultPageFlow
 
DefaultPageFlowControl
Default generic PageFlowControl implementation in a web application.
DefaultPageFlowControlHstSiteMapItemHandler
Default generic HstSiteMapItemHandler implementation to integrate with Page Flow module.
DefaultPageFlowDefinition
Default PageFlowDefinition model implementation.
DefaultPageFlowFactory
 
DefaultPageState
 
DefaultPageStateDefinition
Default PageStateDefinition model implementation.
DefaultPageTransitionDefinition
Default PageTransitionDefinition model implementation.
ErrorItem
Error Item abstraction which is part of Errors.
Errors
Errors abstraction for an application subject (e.g, a field in a form of an application).
EventDefInfo
Event Definition Information model.
HttpSessionPageFlowStore
 
MapPageFlowDefinitionRegistry
Generic purpose Map based PageFlowDefinitionRegistry implementation.
PageFlow
Page Flow runtime abstraction.
PageFlowControl
Page Flow Control abstraction, which provides applications with an easier way to retrieve the current PageFlow instance from the HttpServletRequest, to send redirection to a specific PageState and to complete a PageFlow.
PageFlowDefinition
Page Flow Definition abstraction.
PageFlowDefinitionEventListener
JCR Observation Event listener to unregister Page Flow Definitions from the registry on definition content changes in JCR.
PageFlowDefinitionRegistry
Page Flow Definition Registry abstraction which is responsible for retrieval, removing or clearing PageFlowDefinition instances.
PageFlowException
Generic Page Flow Exception.
PageFlowFactory
Factory abstraction which is responsible for creating a PageFlow instance from a PageFlowDefinition.
PageFlowSiteInfo
Default Page Flow module based ChannelInfo definition, allowing to configure the identifier of the default Page Flow of the channel and the default resource bundle ID(s) (as comma separated string) for the channel.
PageFlowStore
Backend Page Flow Store abstraction.
PageState
Page State runtime abstraction, which is part of a PageFlow.
PageStateDefinition
Page State Definition abstraction which is part of a Page Flow Definition.
PageStateInfo
Page State Information model.
PageTransitionDefinition
Page Transition Definition abstraction, defining the source event name and target PageStateDefinition's ID.
RepositoryMapPageFlowDefinitionRegistry
Generic purpose JCR based PageFlowDefinitionRegistry implementation.
TransitionSourceEventDefServiceFacade
ExternalDocumentServiceFacade implementation to retrieve/select Page Flow Transition Source Event.
TransitionTargetPageStateServiceFacade
ExternalDocumentServiceFacade implementation to retrieve/select Page Flow Transition Target Page State.
